## Fees.borrowingRate() method

Calculate the current borrowing rate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
borrowingRate(when?: Date): Decimal;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

when


</td><td>

Date


</td><td>

Optional timestamp that can be used to calculate what the borrowing rate would decay to at a point of time in the future.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md)

## Remarks

By default, the fee is calculated at the time of the latest block. This can be overridden using the `when` parameter.

To calculate the borrowing fee in HCHF, multiply the borrowed HCHF amount by the borrowing rate.

## Example


```typescript
const fees = await liquity.getFees();

const borrowedHCHFAmount = 100;
const borrowingRate = fees.borrowingRate();
const borrowingFeeHCHF = borrowingRate.mul(borrowedHCHFAmount);
```
